channel.title: Blog on Arjen Wiersma
channel.description: Recent content in Blog on Arjen Wiersma

item.title: A New Theme
item.description: So, a new year, a new theme! I switched my blog to use the Today I Learned Theme. This theme has a great feature where it also maintains a collection of notes and shows a graph with related notes. This is very similar to how I use org-roam. I will not be transferring all my notes over, but I thought it would be a very nice feature to share some of my notes with you.
